meanings.sent1: The knotted rope held the swing securely in place.
meanings.sent2: Her hair was knotted after a long day of playing outside.
meanings.sent3: The knotted shoelaces caused him to trip comically.
meanings.sent4: The knotted traffic jam seemed impossible to untangle.
meanings.sent5: The knotted puzzle was challenging to solve.

meanings.sent1: The knotted wood of the old tree showed its age.
meanings.sent2: The knotted muscles in his back were causing him pain.
meanings.sent3: She found a knotted piece of string and used it as a bracelet.
meanings.sent4: The knotted necklace symbolized their unbreakable bond.
meanings.sent5: The knotted fabric created a unique texture in the design.

meanings.sent1: The knotted thread was difficult to untangle.
meanings.sent2: The knotted yarn created a bumpy texture in the scarf.
meanings.sent3: He found a knotted piece of wire and used it as a makeshift hook.
meanings.sent4: The knotted ribbon added a decorative touch to the gift.
meanings.sent5: The knotted vines twisted around the tree trunk.
